title: "This Card Will Not Sell" - Make Me Eat Old Kroh, Not Drink It
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: "This Card Will Not Sell" - Make Me Eat Old Kroh, Not Drink It
posts.post_content:
For sale is yet another Rube from the T206 set in EXCELLENT condition.
Five-fingered Rube pitched for the Cubbies during their glory years, when all pitchers counted their fingers, but ultimately found more success in Nashville after getting blown out of the "Windy City".

Graded "5" by BVG the card displays well with a Piedmont 350 reverse

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/17250/kroh[/IMG]

Shipping will be absolutely free to the first member willing to pay $74 for this card.  Don't forget the challenge, buy this card and I will eat Kroh :eek:, but not this one.;)
